About This Property
Spacious 2-bed available for March 1st!
Located in a condo complex with a sprawling lakefront shared yard area, benches & walking path, bike storage rack, and a pool. Rent includes heat, hot water, and 2 parking spaces. No pets. First, last, security and broker fee to move in
